issues.title: Missing title tag
issues.why: Search engines and users rely on the title tag to understand the page topic.

issues.title: Title tag is too long
issues.why: Overly long titles may be truncated in search results.

issues.title: Missing meta description
issues.why: A good meta description improves snippet quality and click-through rate.

issues.title: Missing H1 heading
issues.why: The H1 helps clarify the primary topic of the page.

issues.title: Multiple H1 headings
issues.why: Multiple H1s can dilute topical focus.

issues.title: Missing canonical tag
issues.why: Canonical tags help prevent duplicate-content confusion.
